item.title: Nina Ottosson by Outward Hound Interactive Treat Puzzle Game Dog Toys
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) The Nina Ottosson by Outward Hound Dog Brick level 2 puzzle dog game will keep your dog entertained for hours as they use their natural hunting skills to seek out the hidden treats! This toy comes with 3 easy-to-fill compartments to hide your dog’s favorite treats and snacks in. Flip ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $27.49 - $11.17
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:53:57 UTC – Details)


The Nina Ottosson by Outward Hound Dog Brick level 2 puzzle dog game will keep your dog entertained for hours as they use their natural hunting skills to seek out the hidden treats! This toy comes with 3 easy-to-fill compartments to hide your dog’s favorite treats and snacks in. Flip lid compartments open up to reveal the first compartment and can also slides to reveal a hidden second compartment underneath. White, hollow brick-style bones hide the third compartment and can be easily lifted out to place yummy treats! This puzzle is ideal for pups who have already mastered level 1 of the Nina Ottosson puzzle line and are ready to take it up a notch! Made from tough removable plastic parts and food safe materials that are BPA, PVC, and phthalate-free. Hand Wash with soap and water to clean.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 12.75 x 9.25 x 2 inches; 1.19 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 67333M
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 13, 2017
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Outward Hound
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0711Y9XTF
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China
Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More

FLIP, LIFT, & SLIDE TO HIDE TREATS: The Nina Ottosson Dog Brick comes with 3 types of treat hiding compartments to test your furry’ friends skills! Flip lid compartments open and slide to reveal two separate treat hiding spots while removable brick bones conceal the third hidden compartments in this puzzle dog toy.
ENCOURAGES POSITIVE PLAY HABITS: This fun and rewarding puzzle is great for reducing anxious dog behavior and redirecting destructive behavior.
BPA, PVC & PHTHALATE-FREE: Nina Ottosson by Outward Hound interactive treat dog puzzles are designed with your pet’s health in mind from food safe materials that you can trust with your dog. Easy to clean with warm water and soap between uses.
PLAY IT SAFE: No toy is indestructible. Do not leave toys with unsupervised pets. Remove and replace toy if damaged.

Always Supervise

Play together and supervise your dog closely. If your dog wants to chew on the game, correct & redirect their behavior. Start over as quickly as possible and get their attention back on the treats.

Dog Brick Interactive Treat Puzzle Dog Toy

Playtime Problem Solving

Did you know that 15 minutes of mental exercise equals 30 minutes of physical exercise for dogs? Dogs love to explore and problem solve in their own way. Some use their paws and some use their nose. Each game is designed with your dog’s natural behaviors, senses, and safety in mind.

  • Intermediate challenge
  • 20 hidden treat compartments
  • Exercises your dog’s mind
  • Fights boredom & reduces destructive behavior
  • Works best with small treats or kibble
  • Fun for all breeds, sizes, & ages
  • Easy to clean with soap & water
  • BPA, PVA, & phthalate free

Read more





Dog Brick
Dog Tornado
Hide n’ Slide
Dog Casino
Dog Twister
Challenge Slider
Game Level 2 2 2 3 3 3
Treat Compartments 12 12 14 6 9 24
Movable Pieces 12 11 14 12 17 24
Removable Pieces 4 3
Food Capacity 1 Cup 1/2 Cup 1/4 Cup 1 Cup 1 Cup 1 Cup
Multiple Colors Available Yes Yes
Non-Slip Base
✓
✓
✓
✓
✓
✓
Material Plastic Plastic Wood Plastic Composite Plastic Plastic Plastic
Size 1.75″ H x 12.75″ L x 8.75″ W 3.07″ H x 9.75″ L x 7.25″ W 2″ H x 11.6″ L x 11.6″ W 2″ H x 14″ L x 12″ W 1.75″ H x 11.75″ L x 11.75″ W 1.9″ H x 14.7″ L x 14.7″ W

The Benefits of Dog Puzzles

Help Reduce Undesired Behaviors

By putting your dog to work with a puzzle or game, you are focusing their attention and energy effectively, ultimately reducing boredom and destructive behaviors. Puzzles are also a great way to distract dogs from fireworks, thunderstorms and other situations where your dog may get anxious.

Create Balance In Your Dog’s Life

As Nina says—a dog has four legs and one head, and all five need exercise but in different ways. These challenging and rewarding activities will engage your dog’s mind and natural instincts.

Strengthen The Bond With Your Dog

Nina Ottosson puzzles can help build your relationship with a newly adopted dog and help shy dogs come out of their shell. You can also use these puzzles to train and practice basic commands like “sit” and “stay” with your pup.

Read more

Which Level is Best for My Pup?

Level 1 – Beginner

A great way to introduce your pup to problem solving and puzzle games with one-step actions.

Level 2 – Intermediate

Has added obstacles that require your dog to combine actions to reach their reward.

Level 3 – Advanced

Challenges your dog to learn sequential steps to find their treat using more complex mechanisms.

Level 4 – Expert

Requires your dog to complete a series of steps in the correct order for them to earn their treat.

Read more

Meet Nina Ottosson

Nina has been creating puzzle toys for more than 25 years! She started because she wanted a good activity to do with her two small children and her dogs indoors. She realized many others have the same needs so she started developing more games with different difficulty levels for all types of dogs.Fun Fact – Nina received a 2017 Pet Age Icon Award for her development of innovative treat puzzle toys and raising awareness for mental stimulation being an important part of a dogs health.

Read more

4.5
Price: $27.49 - $11.17
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:53:57 UTC – Details)

item.title: Dog Chew Toys for Puppy Teething – 20 Pack Indestructible Pet Dog Toys for Puppy Chewers, Interactive Tug of War Rope Toys for Puppies, Small Dogs Durable Squeaky Toys for Boredom Chew Teething
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Product Description Let’s protect your home and help dogs have more fun! Dogs are known to be terrible chewers when they feel alone and grow teeth. Now, our family chew toys can protect your shoes, clothes, and even your furniture! KILL ALL NEGATIVITY TO BUILD MORE POSITIVE ENERGY ALL DAY ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $22.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:26:48 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Let’s protect your home and help dogs have more fun!

Dogs are known to be terrible chewers when they feel alone and grow teeth. Now, our family chew toys can protect your shoes, clothes, and even your furniture!

KILL ALL NEGATIVITY TO BUILD MORE POSITIVE ENERGY ALL DAY !

4 x Rubber Dog Chew Toy

Made of natural rubber, it is more flexible, durable and safe for your dog to chew and clean his teeth. Allow your dog to breathe better and have a healthier mouth. The cute design makes it easier for your dog to grasp. Puppy chew toy has small dimples that can really soothe your puppy’s gums. Brightly colored dog chew toys are easy to use and can satisfy your dog’s natural urge to chew.

10 x Rope Dog Toy

Tightly hand-woven cotton rope toys for tug-of-war and catch games. With a large selection of rope toys, you can easily replace damaged toys and actually have a longer life span. Your pup will have fun playing with them while keeping them off your shoes or furniture.

1 IQ dog funnel ball and 2 loofah tooth cleaning dog toys

Made of hard plastic, these snack dispensing balls are durable and suitable for dogs to chew. The surface has a regular texture so it won’t roll too far and your dog can easily grab it. Also, your dog will love tossing and rolling the ball to remove treats when they hear the cute squeaking sound.

Perfect Gift for Puppies

20 Pcs valued puppy chew toys great size for teething puppies. An Idea Choice for Your Puppies!

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9 x 7.8 x 3.93 inches; 2.4 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 30, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ qinhe
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09HJR2GBB

【Small Puppy Toys For Furniture Protection】: Are you worried about your puppy chewing on the sofa, shoes, boredom, loneliness and releasing energy while teething? ​Our toys are designed for puppy teething to help change your puppy’s bad chewing behavior, stop worrying, and keep your furniture safe. These puppy chew toys for teething not only clean the incisors, but also help clean the plaque hidden in dead spots, removing plaque and preventing cavities. Keep your puppy’s teeth healthy!
【Interactive Training Small Dog Toys】: The snack ball is a great teething toy for dogs, and it can improve their IQ as they learn to toss and roll it for snacks. When dogs receive a healthy balance of physical and mental stimulation, they feel happy and well-adjusted. A variety of rope toys are perfect for tug-of-war, tossing and fetch games that promote relationships while interacting with your pet. Buy our puppy chew toys and make your dog smarter and happier!
【Safe And Tight Puppy Teething Chew Toys】: The dog rope toy is made of 100% natural washable cotton, non-toxic and odorless, so your pet can chew and play safely. Our cotton rope dog toys are thin, but tough and durable. The wisdom balls and dog bones are also very chewy. If your dog is an aggressive chewer, then these puppy toys are not indestructible. They should only be played with under supervision. Dog toys bulk also keep the toys fresh in your dog’s mind
【Quality Gifts And Service】: This puppy teething toy set is a great gift for friends who have puppies. It is also a great gift for your little family member. From fun indoor activities to outdoor play with your dog, just one set of puppy chew toys is enough to give your dog more fun and exercise in his daily life! If you have any questions about our products, please feel free to contact us, we are always ready to help you solve your problems!


Let’s protect your home and help dogs have more fun!
